# scheduled

**Type Property**

A hint that tells the system to treat a widget with increased priority because it displays important content or requires action.

## Declaration

```swift
static var scheduled: RelevantContext.DateKind { get }
```

## Date types

- **default**: A hint that tells the system to treat a widget with default priority.
- **informational**: A hint that tells the system to treat a widget with slightly lower priority because it displays content and doesn’t require an action.

items.description: A hint that tells the system to treat a widget with default priority.
items.name: default
